text:
AL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
39 
I
nformation for pregnant women 
C
ertain essential information must be provided to all pregnant women, verbally and (where possible) in the form of 
written or illustrated cards or pamphlets. Use the counselling and education list in MCR - provide as appropriate for 
gestational age: 
• Fetal movements
• Parental preparedness
• Nutrition
• Danger signs (see below)
• HIV
• Mental health
• Alcohol
• Tobacco
• Substances
• Domestic violence
• Labour and bir
